name: Strimpland
description:
NEEDS UPDATED DIRECTX TO PLAY

Made for Untitled Beikoz Gamejam

---Controls--
-P1-
Arrow Keys to Move
Z to Jump
X to Attack

-P2-
WASD to Move
J to Jump
K to Attack
